Article Title: “You won’t matter much”: Stephen A. Smith trashes LeBron James with another bold remark right after Los Angeles Lakers star’s response to their ongoing feud
Article Text:
LeBron James and Stephen A Smith. Image via: Brian Fluharty-Imagn Images | Kirby Lee-Imagn Images

Stephen A. Smith fires back at LeBron James, again



What did LeBron James say about his feud with Stephen A. Smith?



Just when it seemed that the highly discussed feud between Los Angeles Lakers legend LeBron James and Stephen A. Smith was over, it took a new turn. After James’s response to the confrontation with Smith in his recent chat with Pat McAfee, Smith did not hold back, as he gave a fiery remark to threaten James’ legacy. The incident has been the talk of the town, and it appears that both parties are not ready to move on just yet.ESPN’s Stephen A. Smith has been one of the vocal critics of Bronny James , and now his attention has shifted to Bronny’s father, LeBron James. After James’ discussion of his courtside confrontation with Smith with F-words, the NBA analyst fueled the fire with more gasoline as he did not hesitate to respond with a bold remark.“But don’t the truth matter?” Smith asked his audience during the latest episode of the show on Wednesday's Stephen A. Smith Show . “Because there’s one person in this ordeal that’s telling the truth and it’s me... And there’s a lot of shady stuff that he does and one of the things is passive aggressiveness and the two facedness,” Smith continued. “I happened to know that about him which is why I don’t like him and he don’t like me but it doesn't stop me from being fair and calling it like I see it.”Smith asked James why his son and family were in the Crypto.com arena if he couldn’t handle the criticism. He further slammed the Lakers veteran for his response to Smith on the Pat McAfee show ."It was fresh out of a timeout. It was him walking to the basketball court. It was on national television. The cameras were rolling. And had I done something, what do y'all want me to do? You want me to act new? You want this to be a reincarnation of Chris Rock and Will Smith?" the NBA analyst recalled the incident.But Smith was all armed up for a fight if the altercation turned into a physical brawl. "And let me state for the record that while we bring up that, let me assure you it wouldn't have gone down like that. I would have gotten my a** kicked because had that man put his hands on me, I would have immediately swung on him. Immediately. That I'm not going to tolerate," he said.He continued, "I knew he wasn't going to do something like that. There was no fear in my mind about it. It was shock because as I have repeatedly stated, I was not talking about his son. I was talking about him."Smith also asserted that James’ legacy in the league does not matter much. "When you retire let's see how much I talk about you then. You won't matter much. I promise you. I won't be talking about you much when you stop playing, but as long as you're playing, I'm going to talk about you because that's my job, and I'm going to be very objective about it. You deserve praise. I'm gonna give it to you. You deserve criticism. I'm gonna give that to, but at least I'm going to tell the truth instead of lying."James recently had a chat with McAfee on the Pat McAfee show, and he gave his reaction to the whole ordeal. "Motherf*****, if there's one person who could not wait to address it," James said."What I do know is that he completely missed the whole point. Missed the whole point. Never would I ever not allow to talk about the sport, criticize players what they do on the court. it is your job. It's part of the game. But when you take it and you get personal with it, it is my job to protect my damn household, but protect the players. I think a lot of the media, including him."Also Read: "We don't talk, because I'm still playing": LeBron James opens up on his relationship with Michael Jordan and what the future might hold The Lakers star further mocked Smith, saying that he “is on a Taylor Swift tour run right now.”
Article Summary: Espn's stephen a. smith has been one of the vocal critics of bronny james. Now his attention has shifted to bronny's father, lebron james. Smith did not hold back, as he gave a fiery remark to threaten james' legacy. The incident has been the talk of the town, and it appears that both parties are not ready to move on.

Article Title: “Relationships start to suffer”: Erin Andrews opens up about the challenges of balancing work, motherhood, and personal life
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Erin Andrews on managing a hectic career while adjusting to the realities of motherhood

Episode 312: CAN YOU GIVE ME A MINUTE?! | Calm Down Podcast

Erin Andrews on juggling a successful broadcasting career, a growing business, and motherhood

Renowned sports broadcaster Erin Andrews is no stranger to navigating a demanding career while balancing personal responsibilities. However, during a recent episode of the Calm Down podcast, Andrews got emotional as she reflected on what she described as an incredibly difficult year juggling work, motherhood, and her personal life.As a veteran Fox Sports reporter, Erin Andrews has spent years covering the NFL with relentless dedication. But now, as a mother to nearly 2-year-old Mack—whom she shares with husband and former NHL player Jarret Stoll—she’s finding that the demands of her career and family life are harder to balance than ever.“It’s really hard, it really is,” Erin Andrews admitted during a live taping of her podcast with co-host Charissa Thompson. “My better half [Stoll] works in the hockey world, and so his season is going on at the same time. This was a really, really hard year. I’m going to get emotional about it.”Erin Andrews recalled that during Mack’s first year as a newborn, it was easier to leave for work. But now, as he grows older and more aware of her departures, the emotional toll has increased. “I had this attitude like, ‘I have this career and this is how it’s going to be.’ And then he starts talking and realizing you’re leaving, and it was just really, really hard.”Beyond her broadcasting career, Andrews is also deeply involved in her clothing line, WEAR by Erin Andrews, making her schedule even more demanding. She shared how she often felt like she wasn’t giving enough to any aspect of her life.“I would just have multiple meltdowns with Charissa saying, ‘I feel like I’m not giving 100 percent of myself to my son, or my job, or my clothing line, and I feel like I am barely above water,’” Andrews revealed. “And then your relationships start to suffer.”She admitted that the intensity of the football season kept her from seeing friends and maintaining personal connections. Once the season ended, she looked back and thought, “I don’t know… excuse me, how the f–k I did that.”Reflecting on the past year, Andrews recognized the need to be kinder to herself. “I need to go easier on myself, and I’ve realized that. I was so worried I wasn’t giving all of myself to both things that I was doing the best I could, and everybody’s fine. I just need to give myself a little grace.”Her openness about the struggles of working motherhood resonates with many, especially those juggling high-pressure careers with raising children. As she moves into the next NFL season, Andrews hopes to apply the lessons she’s learned, prioritizing balance and self-compassion.Also Read: Taylor Swift’s iHeartRadio speech hides a secret—Fans think they’ve uncovered it Her journey, marked by resilience and honesty, continues to inspire, proving that even the most accomplished women face the challenge of finding harmony between career and family.
Article Summary: Erin andrews is a veteran fox sports reporter and mother to nearly 2-year-old mack. She got emotional as she reflected on what she described as an incredibly difficult year juggling work, motherhood, and her personal life. Her openness about the struggles of working motherhood resonates with many.

Article Title: WWE WrestleMania Afterdark: All music artists, date, timings, how to watch and more
Article Text:
Image via WWE

All Music Artists announced for the show

Date, timings, and lineup



How to watch WWE WrestleMania Afterdark?

Which WWE superstars have been announced for the WrestleMania Afterdark?

The WrestleMania festivities had added all-new events this year, which have built further excitement to the Show of Shows.WWE is moving fast-paced on the road to WrestleMania 41 and culminates at the Allegiant Stadium on April 19 and 20 in Las Vegas, Nevada. The match card is shaping to be a stacked one featuring top stars like John Cena, Cody Rhodes, Roman Reigns, CM Punk and Seth Rollins. Alongside the main show, WWE is set to feature multiple events during WrestleMania week, which includes new festivities to build more excitement for the fans in Las Vegas.One of the newest additions is WWE WrestleMania 41 Afterdark. It will be a series of musical nights featuring top music artists and WWE superstars. It will take place at the LIV and LIV Beach in Fontainebleau in Las Vegas and will transform the music world into professional wrestling.Several top music artists who have also been a part of WWE will be performing on different nights. The lineup includes Valentino Khan, Metro Boomin, Machine Gun Kelly and Gronk Flo Rida. The event will happen across four nights with each of the artist performing separately.17th April 2025 - Valentino Khan, DJ IRIE18th April 2025- Metro Boomin, DJ IRIE19th April 2025- Machine Gun Kelly, DJ IRIE20th April 2025- Gronk, FloridaEvery single night, the musical performance will begin from 10:30 PM to 4:00 AM.As of now, WWE has not announced any platform where the event will be streamed live. It is expected to be a live event to be experienced by the attendees in Las Vegas.Top WWE superstars such as Rey Mysterio, Charlotte Flair, Bron Breakker, and Jey Uso have been announced for different nights in Las Vegas. The lineup is as follows:17th April 2025 - Bianca Belair, Charlotte Flair, Rey Mysterio18th April 2025- Bron Breakker, Liv Morgan19th April 2025- Jey Uso, Jimmy Uso20th April 2025- Tiffany Straton, Damian PriestWrestleMania Afterdark promises to be one of the most enthralling nights during the WrestleMania 41 week, Tickets on sale this Friday at 10am PT.Also read: WWE set to induct The Natural Disasters into Hall of Fame class of 2025
Article Summary: Wrestlemania 41 culminates at the allegiant stadium on april 19 and 20 in las vegas, nevada. The wrestlemania festivities had added all-new events this year, which have built further excitement to the show of shows. One of the newest additions is wwe wrestlemania 41 afterdark.

Article Title: Paul Bissonnette slams Oilers’ costly blunder for letting $9M star go: “What the hell is going on?”
Article Text:
Paul Bissonnette (Via: Getty Images)

Edmonton Oilers’ offseason mistake: The fallout of letting key players walk



Paul Bissonnette on the Four Nations Face-Off & Hockey’s Future | Games With Names

Holloway and Broberg making Edmonton regret their decision



Could this mistake cost Edmonton a shot at Stanley Cup?



The Edmonton Oilers made what seemed like a smart financial decision last offseason, choosing not to match the St. Louis Blues ’ offer sheets for Philip Broberg and Dylan Holloway . But now, as both players thrive in St. Louis, Oilers fans and analysts are left questioning whether this was a disastrous misstep. Could letting go of these rising stars come back to haunt Edmonton in the playoffs?The Oilers opted not to match the offer sheets extended to Broberg and Holloway by the St. Louis Blues. Broberg, a 23-year-old defenseman, signed a two-year, $9.16 million deal, while Holloway inked a two-year, $4.59 million contract. With the Oilers already balancing hefty contracts for superstars like Connor McDavid and Leon Draisaitl, they chose to let both players go rather than stretch their cap space.At first glance, it appeared to be a pragmatic decision. But as the current season unfolds, it’s clear that the Oilers may have underestimated the value of these young talents. Broberg has emerged as a standout defenseman in St. Louis, even outperforming some of Edmonton’s key blueliners in pivotal moments. Holloway, on the other hand, has taken his offensive game to another level, proving to be a dynamic force in the Blues' lineup.Holloway and Broberg have silenced any doubts about their potential. The former first-round picks have played a crucial role in the Blues’ playoff push, with Holloway amassing 58 points (23 goals, 35 assists) in 72 games and Broberg contributing 23 points (seven goals, 16 assists) in 59 games. Their stellar performances have propelled St. Louis into the final wildcard spot in the Western Conference, positioning them as a dangerous team heading into the postseason.Former NHLer Paul Bissonnette recently weighed in on the decision, questioning why Edmonton would willingly part ways with young, physically dominant players after a deep playoff run. His concerns resonate with Oilers fans who now watch Broberg and Holloway excel elsewhere while their team struggles to find the same spark as last season.The Oilers are still a formidable team and remain on track for a playoff berth, but their current roster lacks the depth and youthful energy that Broberg and Holloway provided. Could this move ultimately cost them a Stanley Cup run? If St. Louis continues their surge, Edmonton’s front office may have to answer some tough questions about why they let two rising stars slip away.Also Read: Quinn Hughes: The Canucks’ captain who leads with heart and game-changing plays For now, all eyes will be on St. Louis as they put their six-game winning streak on the line. If Broberg and Holloway continue their dominant play, this could be a decision that Oilers fans won’t soon forget.
Article Summary: Edmonton oilers let philip broberg and dylan holloway leave for the st. louis blues. Broberg signed a two-year, $9.16 million deal, while holloway inked a $4.59 million contract. The former first-round picks have played a crucial role in the blues’ playoff push. Could this mistake cost edmonton a shot at stanley cup?

Article Title: “I’m there!”: Sexxy Red responds to Jey Uso’s invite to join him at WrestleMania 41
Article Text:
Jey Uso (L), US pop star Sexxy Red (R)

Will Sexxy Red accompany WWE star Jey Uso?

John Cena wants to RUIN wrestling, Jey Uso wants to shock the world: Raw Recap, March 24, 2025

(source: Fightful)

Also Read

WWE Royal Rumble 2025 Champion Jey Uso , who is set to lock horns with Gunther at the upcoming WrestleMania 41 on April 19, 2025, recently expressed his desire to have US rapper and singer Sexxy Red to accompany him to the ring at the Show of Shows.Initially, the current champion revealed that he wants either Cardi B or Sexxy Red to accompany him to the ring. No sooner did Jey Uso request the US pop sensations to join him at the World Heavyweight Championship against Gunther than Sexxy Red responded to the WWE star's request. Let's find out if the US pop star has accepted the request to join Jey Uso to the WrestleMania 41 ring. WWE star Jey Uso has recently asked US pop sensation Sexxy Red to accompany him to the ring at WrestleMania 41 , as the WWE heavyweight champion will face Gunther for the world title at WrestleMania 41, at Allegiant Stadium in Paradise, Nevada.During an interview in this week’s WWE Raw Recap podcast, Jey Uso was asked who he would like to escort him to the ring for his World Heavyweight Championship match. Uso responded that he wanted someone such as Cardi B or Sexxy Red to accompany him to the ring. But, later revealed that she wants Sexxy Red to appear with him during the match.Jey Uso in the interview stated, “I want a female though, a female rapper, Uce. Cardi B. We out there in New York. You know what I’m saying? Sexyy Red, you've been down there a couple of times at NXT.” He continued, “You can YEET with me up here, too.”Meanwhile, Sexxy Red has responded to Jey Uso’s request, and it seems she is ready to appear on the Show of Shows with Jey Uso. The US star has taken to her Twitter account and expressed her interest in escorting Uso during the match. Taking to her X handle, Sexxy Red wrote: “Yal tell Jey Uso I’m there!”Previously, Sexyy Red has made appearances on NXT and Raw last year and it appears that she has been a WWE favorite. Reports suggest that, Sexyy Red will continue to feature in the WWE, and WrestleMania 41 seems a very likely place for that to happen.
Article Summary: Us pop star sexxy red has responded to wwe star jey uso's request to accompany him to the ring at wrestlemania 41. The wwe heavyweight champion will face gunther for the world title on april 19, 2025 at allegiant stadium in paradise, nevada. Uso initially said that he wanted either cardi b or sexxy red to accompany his match.

Article Title: Jessica Campbell admits shedding 'happy tears' after becoming NHL’s first female assistant coach
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

The grind of the AHL and the transition to the NHL



Seattle Kraken's Jessica Campbell chats with Julie & Cat | Episode 10

When Jessica Campbell received the life-changing call that she had been named assistant coach of the Seattle Kraken , she immediately broke down in tears of joy. The former player has loved hockey her whole life. She started as a player in Canada before pivoting to coaching. Her hiring in July made history, as she became the first female full-time assistant coach behind an NHL bench. The moment was deeply emotional for Campbell, who had spent years working toward this opportunity.Campbell's milestone moment wasn’t lost on her—or the fans. She received a loud ovation when she was introduced at Climate Pledge Arena during the Kraken’s season opener against the St. Louis Blues.“It was a surreal moment because I had been working toward this for so long,” she shared her feelings. “But when I called home, I just immediately started crying—happy tears. My parents thought something was wrong and instantly went into parent-protect mode, asking, ‘Are you okay?’ Of course, I was okay, and pretty quickly, we were all crying.”Before leaping to the NHL, Campbell worked in the AHL, where the demands of the job took a toll on her. “In this league, that’s a good thing, but it’s also taxing—physically, emotionally, and mentally,” Campbell said. “I never had much time to go home and see my family. Those windows were really small, and you learn to cherish the moments you do get.”Her transition from the AHL to the NHL happened almost overnight. “When I got the news, I was in Seattle at development camp, fully in my AHL role. Then, overnight, I went from being an AHL coach to an NHL coach,” she added.Also read: “Have to go the longer route”: First and only female NHL coach Jessica Campbell talks about her journey The journey hasn’t been easy, but Campbell’s historic rise is a testament to her dedication, resilience, and passion for the game. While she acknowledges the weight of her achievement, Campbell remains focused on the future. Fans expect that she has more such history-making and record-breaking achievements coming her way.
Article Summary: Jessica campbell became the first female full-time assistant coach behind an nhl bench in july. The former player has loved hockey her whole life and started as a player in canada before pivoting to coaching. Campbell worked in the ahl, where the demands of the job took a toll on her.

Article Title: IPL match today, RR vs KKR: Dream 11 Team Prediction, head to head, Barsapara Cricket Stadium pitch report, weather in Guwahati
Article Text:
Kolkata Knight Riders' players Quinton de Kock and Rinku Singh during a training session ahead of the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 match against Rajasthan Royals at ACA Stadium in Guwahati. (PTI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Pitch report for RR vs KKR

RR in IPL 2025: Rajasthan Royals hope for first title in 17 years

RR vs KKR Dream11 Team Prediction

RR predicted playing XI:

RR Impact Sub:

KKR predicted playing XI:

KKR Impact Sub:

RR vs KKR squads, IPL match Today

KKR in IPL 2025: Kolkata Knight Riders seek successful title defence

Rajasthan Royals squad:

Kolkata Knight Riders squad:

RR vs KKR head-to-head record

'RCB bowled really well in the powerplay': Ajinkya Rahane

RR vs KKR IPL 2025, Guwahati weather prediction

IPL 2025: How will KKR, MI, CSK, SRH, RCB fare this season?

After being outclassed in their previous matches, title holders Kolkata Knight Riders and Rajasthan Royals are looking for a quick turnaround when they meet in an IPL match today (March 26).The Knight Riders lost to Royal Challengers Bengaluru by seven wickets in their opener, while the Royals suffered a 44-run defeat against Sunrisers Hyderabad.Both teams share a common issue: their once-impressive batting and bowling units have failed to perform. While the Royals might attribute their bowling struggles to playing at a difficult Hyderabad venue, the Knight Riders lack such an excuse.Except for Sunil Narine, none of the KKR bowlers managed to restrain the aggressive RCB lineup, raising concerns about the effectiveness of mystery spinner Varun Chakravarthy, who struggled significantly. Even on Eden Gardens' pitch, which had some grip, Chakravarthy was hit hard by Phil Salt and Virat Kohli.The KKR camp is hopeful that Chakravarthy will regain his form on a Guwahati pitch that typically offers more assistance to bowlers.The Barsapara Cricket Stadium in Guwahati has hosted four matches in IPL history - two in 2023 and two in 2024. The highest total at this ground came courtesy Rajasthan Royals who scored 199 against Delhi Capitals. The RR vs KKR fixture was washed out last year at this venue.Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson, Riyan Parag(c), Nitish Rana, Dhruv Jurel(wk), Shimron Hetmyer, Shubham Dubey, Jofra Archer, Wanindu Hasaranga, Maheesh Theekshana, Tushar Deshpande, Sandeep Sharma, Akash Madhwal.Yudhvir Charak/Kunal Singh Rathore.Quinton de Kock (w), Sunil Narine, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Venkatesh Iyer, Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Rinku Singh, Andre Russell, Ramandeep Singh, Harshit Rana, Spencer Johnson, Varun Chakaravarthy.Vaibhav Arora/Manish Pandey.Sanju Samson (c), Yashasvi Jaiswal, Riyan Parag, Dhruv Jurel, Jofra Archer, Shimron Hetmyer, Tushar Deshpande, Wanindu Hasaranga, Maheesh Theekshana, Nitish Rana, Sandeep Sharma, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Kwena Maphaka, Akash Madhwal, Vaibhav Suryavanshi, Shubham Dubey, Yudhvir Singh, Kunal Singh Rathore, Ashok Sharma, Kumar KartikeyaRinku Singh, Varun Chakaravarthy, Sunil Narine, Andre Russell, Harshit Rana, Ramandeep Singh, Venkatesh Iyer, Quinton de Kock, Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Anrich Nortje, Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Vaibhav Arora, Mayank Markande, Rovman Powell, Manish Pandey, Spencer Johnson, Luvnith Sisodia, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Anukul Roy, Moeen Ali, Chetan SakariyaAs the RR vs KKR head-to-head record reads, the two teams have played each other 30 times in the IPL, with the Royals and the Knight Riders winning 14 each. Two matches ended in no results.Interestingly two of the matches between the two teams went into Super Overs with the Royals clinching both of them.Guwahati is predicted to witness nearly 50% humidity while reeling 25-30 degree Celsius weather. The humidity level is expected to rise as the evening progresses which could make things daunting for the team fielding second.
Article Summary: Kolkata knight riders and rajasthan royals meet in ipl match today (march 26) knight riders lost to royal challengers bengaluru by seven wickets in their opener. Royals suffered a 44-run defeat against sunrisers hyderabad. The rr vs kkr fixture was washed out last year at this venue.

Article Title: IPL 2025 Orange Cap and Purple Cap Updated Standings: Ishan Kishan and Noor Ahmad lead the race
Article Text:
Ishan Kishan (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

IPL Orange Cap Standings 2025

Player Matches Runs Average SR Ishan Kishan (SRH) 1 106 -- 225.53 Dhruv Jurel (RR) 2 103 51.50 163.49 Quinton De Kock (KKR) 2 101 101.00 153.03 Shreyas Iyer (PBKS) 1 97 -- 230.95 Sanju Samson (RR) 2 79 39.50 2

IPL Purple Cap Standings 2025



Player Matches Wickets Ave. Econ. BBI Noor Ahmad (CSK) 1 4 4.50 4.50 4/18 Khaleel Ahmed (CSK) 1 3 9.66 7.25 3/29 Krunal Pandya (RCB) 1 3 9.66 7.25 3/29 Varun Chakaravarthy (KKR) 2 3 20.00 7.50 2/17 Sai Kishore (GT) 1 3 10.00 7.50 3/30

Quinton de Kock's blistering 97 not out on a challenging Barsapara wicket in Kolkata Knight Riders' eight-wicket victory against Rajasthan Royals has propelled him to third place in the IPL Orange Cap standings. With two matches under his belt, de Kock has accumulated 101 runs at an average of 101.00 and a strike rate of 153.03. Ishan Kishan of Sunrisers Hyderabad leads the charts with a dazzling 106 runs at a strike rate of 225.53, while Dhruv Jurel's consistent performances for Rajasthan Royals place him second with 103 runs at an impressive strike rate of 163.49. Shreyas Iyer of Punjab Kings also enters the top five with a stunning 97 off just one match at a strike rate of 230.95, proving his aggressive intent.In the IPL Purple Cap standings, the left-arm wrist spinner Noor Ahmad of Chennai Super Kings leads the charge, having taken four wickets in his debut match at an astonishing average of 4.50 and an economy rate of 4.50.Khaleel Ahmed of CSK and Krunal Pandya of RCB share second place with three wickets each, both boasting an average of 9.66 and an economy rate of 7.25.Varun Chakravarthy, KKR's mystery spinner, has made a notable entry into the top five with three wickets from two games, maintaining a solid economy rate of 7.50 and a best bowling figure of 2/17. Sai Kishore of Gujarat Titans completes the top five with three wickets from one match, an average of 10.00, and an economy rate of 7.50.
Article Summary: Ishan kishan of sunrisers hyderabad leads the charts with 106 runs at a strike rate of 225.53. Dhruv jurel's consistent performances for rajasthan royals place him second with 103 runs. Quinton de kock's blistering 97 not out in kolkata knight riders' eight-wicket victory has propelled him to third place in the ipl orange cap standings.

Article Title: Punjab Kings co-owner Preity Zinta reacts to Shreyas Iyer sacrificing his ton: 'Some 97’s are better than ...'
Article Text:
Shreyas Iyer (PTI Photo)

NEW DELHI: Punjab Kings ’ captain Shreyas Iyer may have missed out on his maiden IPL century, but his selfless approach in the season opener against Gujarat Titans has won hearts.While Iyer’s unbeaten 97 off just 42 balls powered PBKS to a commanding 243/5, it was his decision to prioritise the team’s success over personal milestones that stole the spotlight.As the final over began, Iyer was just three runs shy of a century, but his batting partner Shashank Singh unleashed a stunning 23-run assault, ensuring PBKS posted an imposing total.Instead of demanding the strike, Iyer encouraged Shashank to continue attacking. "Shreyas told me, 'Shashank, don’t worry about my hundred, just keep hitting,'" the young batter revealed post-match.The selfless gesture drew widespread praise, including from Punjab Kings’ co-owner, Preity Zinta Taking to social media, Zinta hailed Iyer’s leadership and team-first mentality, writing, “Some 97s are better than a hundred. Take a bow @ShreyasIyer15 for showing class, leadership & aggression.” She also lauded other key contributors to PBKS' victory, including Shashank Singh, Marco Jansen, Arshdeep Singh , Vijaykumar Vyshak, and Priyansh Arya.Despite missing out on a century, Iyer’s knock earned him the Player of the Match award and the admiration of cricketing legends and fans alike. With PBKS off to a winning start, the team will look to build on this momentum as the IPL 2025 season progresses.Meanwhile, Preity Zinta, who has been associated with Punjab’s IPL franchise since 2008, is gearing up for her Bollywood comeback with Lahore 1947 after a seven-year hiatus.ALSO READ: Why Virat Kohli, MS Dhoni are facing criticism after Shreyas Iyer's selfless act in IPL 2025
Article Summary: Punjab kings captain shreyas iyer missed out on his maiden ipl century. But his selfless approach in the season opener against gujarat titans has won hearts. Iyer’s unbeaten 97 off just 42 balls powered pbks to a commanding 243/5.

Article Title: Angels release outfielder Mickey Moniak in surprising move prior to 2025 MLB season
Article Text:
Mickey Moniak via Instagram

Outfielder Mickey Moniak makes a surprise exit from the Los Angeles Angels

“As we improve as an organization, which is obviously the goal, the decisions become tougher. I think that’s something we want every year.”

“We want difficult decisions every single year. That means your 40-man’s better, your depth’s better, that means you’re drafting the right players. From an international standpoint, you’re signing the right players.”

“He’s a good guy; he meant a lot to us, but again, there’s always competition, and there’s always the possibility of someone coming. This spring, it was Kyren Paris. We just feel like he deserves to be here and get an opportunity to run around in centerfield.”

Outfielder Mickey Moniak was shown the exit door by the Los Angeles Angels prior to the 2025 MLB season. The Angels former no. 1 overall pick diverted media attention after his unexpected exit paved the way for the left fielder Jo Adell to the center position on the roster lineup. With almost a day to the official opening day for the 2025 MLB season, the sudden exit of Moniak has even led to a significant reduction in his expected salary from the Angels.With the official opening day of the 2025 MLB season just around the corner, the shocking exit of talented outfielder Mickey Moniak from the Los Angeles Angels has created waves in the world of baseball. Reportedly, the Angels owe him only $484,000 from his signing amount of $2 million as he enters into free agency. During a recent interview with the MLB Network, the Los Angeles Angels manager, Perry Minasian , addressed the frequent roster changes in the team. He said-Minasian further explained-Manager Ron Washington even reacted to Moniak’s exit from the team. After their loss against the Los Angeles Dodgers, Washington reacted to his exit. He said-Kyren Paris is a multitalented athlete as he has appeared at multiple positions on the lineup, including base, center fielding, designated hitter, as well as a shortstop too. Reportedly, Paris would be assisting Jo Adell with respect to the center field for the 2025 MLB season after the exit of Mickey Moniak.
Article Summary: Outfielder mickey moniak was shown the exit door by the los angeles angels prior to the 2025 mlb season. The angels former no. 1 overall pick diverted media attention after his unexpected exit paved the way for the left fielder jo adell to the center position on the roster lineup.

Article Title: Watch: Fan invades pitch to meet Riyan Parag during IPL 2025 match in Guwahati
Article Text:
Security officials catch a pitch invader during the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 cricket match between Rajasthan Royals and Kolkata Knight Riders in Guwahati. (PTI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Bombay Sports Exchange Episode 1: Interview with Sanjog Gupta, CEO (Sports) at JioStar

A fan breached security at the Barsapara Cricket Stadium in Guwahati during the IPL 2025 match between Rajasthan Royals and Kolkata Knight Riders on Tuesday. The young supporter ran onto the field to touch stand-in captain Riyan Parag 's feet while he was bowling.The incident occurred in the second innings as KKR were chasing 152 runs. The fan managed to reach Parag, touched his feet, and hugged him before security personnel intervened and removed him from the field.This match marked Parag's first appearance as IPL captain in his home state of Assam. He is leading RR for the initial three matches due to regular captain Sanju Samson's finger injury.Samson played in both this match and RR's season opener against Sunrisers Hyderabad, but only as a batter. The BCCI's Centre of Excellence cleared him for batting but advised against wicketkeeping, leading to his role as an Impact Player.This was the season's second pitch invasion incident. The first occurred at Eden Gardens during the KKR-Royal Challengers Bengaluru opener when a fan entered the field to meet Virat Kohli. That individual was arrested and banned from the stadium for the remainder of the season.The incident highlighted Parag's popularity in Assam, as he is the state's first IPL cricketer. Rajasthan Royals' decision to schedule two matches in Guwahati appears strategic, suggesting they view him as a potential successor to Samson.Parag's performance in the match was mixed. He scored a quick 25 runs off 15 balls batting at number three but fell to Varun Chakaravarthy at a crucial moment. His bowling figures were 25 runs from four overs without any wickets.Rajasthan Royals remain without a win in IPL 2025. Their next match is against Chennai Super Kings in Guwahati on March 30.
Article Summary: Rajasthan royals and kolkata knight riders played in guwahati on tuesday. A fan ran onto the field to touch stand-in captain riyan parag's feet while he was bowling. Parag is leading rr for the initial three matches due to regular captain sanju samson's finger injury.

Article Title: Shattering records and cultivating future stars
Article Text:
Mayura Shanbaug

Ashish Kumar Srivastava - MD and CEO of PNB MetLife

Sameer Bansal - Chief Distribution Officer of PNB MetLife

Chirag Shetty - Asian Games Gold Medalist & JBC 2023 mentor

Satwiksairaj Rankireddy - Asian Games Gold Medalist & JBC 2023 mentor

Disclaimer: Content Produced by PNB Metlife



Stay informed with the latest business news, updates on bank holidays and public holidays.





The 7th PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship shattered records with over 8,200 young talent nationwide, earning global recognition and fostering a culture of resilience and determination in aspiring badminton starsIn a spectacular display of badminton prowess and youthful enthusiasm, the 7th edition of the PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship (JBC) etched its name in the annals of sporting history. Celebrating a staggering participation of 8257 young champions from across India, the championship not only broke its own record set in 2022 but also clinched the title of the ‘Most kids participating in a Badminton Championship in multiple cities’ as recognised by the World Record Certification Agency (WRCA).The grand finale unfolded at the Indira Gandhi Indoor Stadium in New Delhi, where the air was thick with competition, camaraderie, and the unmistakable passion for badminton. The event, graced by chief guests Chirag Shetty and Satwik Rankireddy, Asian Games Gold Medalists and JBC 2023 mentors, was a true celebration of the sport’s rising stars.The 10-city extravaganza, spanning the length and breadth of the country, showcased the unwavering commitment of PNB MetLife in nurturing young talents in the badminton arena. With participants exceeding 8200, it’s evident that the PNB MetLife JBC has become a beacon for aspiring shuttlers, highlighting the deep-seated passion for badminton among the diverse and talented youth of India.Beyond the glitz and glamour of the record-breaking numbers, the championship holds a special place in the hearts of those at the helm. Ashish Kumar Srivastava, MD and CEO of PNB MetLife, expressed pride in not just surpassing their own world record but also in contributing to India’s glory on the international badminton stage. The championship, he emphasized, is not merely a competition but a significant milestone in creating a pan-India badminton ecosystem.This edition of the JBC saw a strategic partnership with world champions Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy, who served as mentors for the young talents. Sameer Bansal, Chief Distribution Officer of PNB MetLife, acknowledged the pivotal role played by these champions in inspiring the next generation of badminton stars. The focus, according to Bansal, is on unleashing the latent potential of young shuttlers and preparing them for global excellence.The Delhi chapter of the championship witnessed some nail-biting action with over 1000 participants competing fiercely across various categories. From Ananya Talyan’s stellar performance in Girls Singles Under 9 to Divyansh Rawat’s triumph in Boys Singles Under 17, the young talents left no shuttle unturned in their quest for victory.The results from the Delhi leg not only showcased the raw talent but also highlighted the championship’s commitment to breaking barriers. The PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship is not just about records; it’s about fostering a culture of healthy living, determination, and resilience among the future champions of the sport.In the words of Satwiksairaj Rankireddy, the championship serves as an invaluable platform.---------------------------------------------------------------As we celebrate the successful culmination of the 7th edition of PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship , we take pride in surpassing our own world record for highest participation and for being recognized by World Record Certification Agency. Beyond the records, JBC represents a significant milestone in our mission to lay the groundwork for India’ s glory and success on the international badminton stage by creating a pan-India badminton ecosystem that nurtures champions at the grassroots levelThis year has been especially remarkable for PNB MetLife JBC as we joined hands with world champions Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy as JBC Mentors for the young talents associated with this tournament. They have played a pivotal role in inspiring young shuttlers to dream big and elevate their game and skills. We are eager for the next edition to unfold in our journey of unveiling the latent badminton potential across our nation and preparing them for global excellenceIt’s inspiring to witness the boundless talent and enthusiasm within our young athletes. My journey as JBC mentor has been incredibly fulfilling, as I got the opportunity to guide these budding champions and witness the journey of these young badminton stars. This championship is more than a competition; it is a platform that nurtures dreams, ignites aspirations, and, I believe, it is laying the foundation for future gold medalists in the makingTournaments like these serve as an invaluable platform for nurturing and harnessing the potential of our country’s young badminton stars. Witnessing the enthusiasm, passion, and skill displayed by these emerging shuttlers reinforces the belief that our country has an immense reservoir of talent. My association as a JBC mentor has been a source of immense pride, particularly given the role that the championship is playing in creating an incredible platform that is serving as a powerful catalyst, empowering young players and bolstering their confidence to become future champions
Article Summary: The 7th pnb metlife junior badminton championship shattered records with over 8,200 young talent nationwide. The grand finale unfolded at the indira gandhi indoor stadium in new delhi, where the air was thick with competition, camaraderie, and the unmistakable passion for badminton.

IPL 2025 tournament format

Group stage : Teams are divided into two groups of five. Each team plays the other teams in their group twice (home and away) and the teams in the other group once, making a total of 14 matches.

: Teams are divided into two groups of five. Each team plays the other teams in their group twice (home and away) and the teams in the other group once, making a total of 14 matches. Playoffs: The top four teams based on league standings will qualify for the playoffs, comprising Qualifier 1, Eliminator, Qualifier 2, and the Final.

The much-anticipated RCB Unbox Event 2025 has started at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru. This event has become an annual tradition for the Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) franchise, serving as the official curtain-raiser for their Indian Premier League (IPL) campaign. First introduced in 2022, the RCB Unbox event is a grand celebration where the team unveils its new jersey, introduces the squad to fans, and inducts legends into the RCB Hall of Fame.This year’s edition promises an exciting lineup of performances, appearances by star players, and several surprises. The event will also provide fans with an opportunity to interact with their favorite cricketers and experience the electrifying atmosphere of the Chinnaswamy Stadium. With speculation surrounding the potential induction of Dinesh Karthik into the Hall of Fame, fans have another reason to look forward to this event.Fans who are unable to attend the event in person can still catch the action live. The event will be streamed exclusively on:For those looking to experience the event live at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium, tickets can be purchased online.Ticket booking details:Fans are advised to book their tickets early, as the event is expected to be sold out quickly due to high demand.The RCB Unbox event is not just about cricket; it is a full-fledged entertainment spectacle featuring live performances, jersey launches, player interactions, and special ceremonies. Some of the key highlights include:RCB will officially unveil their IPL 2025 jersey, a moment eagerly awaited by fans. This will mark the first time the players step out in their new colors ahead of the upcoming season.The complete RCB men’s and women’s squads will be introduced in front of the fans. This will be the first chance for supporters to see their new signings along with retained players.One of the most emotional moments of the event is the RCB Hall of Fame induction. In 2022, AB de Villiers and Chris Gayle were honored, while R Vinay Kumar joined them in 2023. This year, speculations suggest that Dinesh Karthik might be inducted, recognizing his contributions to the franchise before his retirement and new role as RCB's batting coach.A major attraction of RCB Unbox is the live music and entertainment lineup featuring some of the biggest names. The performers for RCB Unbox 2025 include:These artists will set the stage on fire with high-energy performances, adding to the vibrant atmosphere of the event.Several star cricketers will be present at the RCB Unbox event. Some of the key players expected to attend include:Additionally, the RCB Women’s team is also likely to make an appearance at the event, adding to the excitement for fans.
Article Summary: The much-anticipated rcb unbox event 2025 has started at the m. chinnaswamy stadium in bengaluru. The event has become an annual tradition for the royal challengers bangalore (rcb) franchise, serving as the official curtain-raiser for their indian premier league (ipl) campaign.

Article Title: Book IPL 2025 tickets online: Check IPL tickets prices, booking platform, match schedule, and other details
Article Text:
Book IPL tickets 2025 online and offline: Everything you need to know

Visit the booking website – Go to any of the ticketing platforms such as BookMyShow, Paytm Insider, IPLT20.com, or TicketGenie.

Select the match – Choose the specific IPL match from the available list.

Choose seating category – Select a seating option from categories ranging from General to VIP.

Proceed to checkout – Enter personal details like name, email, and phone number.

Make the payment – Choose a payment method (debit/credit card, UPI, net banking) and complete the transaction.

Receive confirmation – A confirmation SMS and email with ticket details will be sent after successful booking.

Stadium box offices: Fans can visit the box offices located at the stadiums hosting IPL matches to buy tickets directly. These box offices usually open a few days prior to the match and provide fans the opportunity to purchase tickets for specific games. This option is ideal for those who want to choose their seats personally or avoid online bookings.

Authorised retail outlets: IPL tickets are also available through a network of authorized retail outlets situated in various cities. These outlets are officially recognized by the IPL and offer fans a physical location to purchase tickets. Whether it’s a dedicated retail store or a partner outlet, these locations offer a hands-on alternative for those who prefer buying tickets in person.

Important Notes about IPL 2025 ticket booking

It is advisable to book tickets early, especially for high-profile matches such as:

Chennai Super Kings vs Mumbai Indians



Chennai Super Kings vs Royal Challengers Bengaluru



Mumbai Indians vs Royal Challengers Bengaluru

Always book tickets only from authorized platforms to avoid fraudulent sellers.

Tickets will be available in multiple price categories, with premium seating offering better views and additional perks.

India vs New Zealand Champions Trophy final game is going to be a thrilling encounter on Sunday, March 9, 2025, in Dubai. India, seeking their third title, will take on New Zealand, the 2000 Champions Trophy champions, in a much-awaited contest. Rohit Sharma's side qualified after an enthralling semi-final victory against the World Champions, while New Zealand beat South Africa convincingly to make it to the final. Cricket enthusiasts await the unfolding of this high-voltage match with bated breath. Get ready for the final India vs New Zealand match tomorrow. Know everything about the timings of the match, live television broadcast, and streaming websites to make sure that you don't miss a second of the India vs New Zealand Champions Trophy final match.The India vs New Zealand ICC Champions Trophy 2025 promises thrilling cricket action. Find all the essential details, including the date, venue, match time, and more.The ICC Champions Trophy 2025 final will be telecast live on Star Sports and Sports 18.Cricket fans in India can stream the ICC Champions Trophy final live on the JioHotstar app and website, with commentary in multiple languages including English, Hindi, and more.The India vs New Zealand ICC Champions Trophy match is set to showcase top-tier cricket. Both teams have announced their squads, featuring key players like Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, and Jasprit Bumrah for India, alongside Tom Latham, Devon Conway, and Matt Henry for New Zealand. Stay tuned for an exciting showdown!The India vs New Zealand final promises an exciting showdown in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. With both teams at the top of their game, fans can expect a thrilling contest filled with exceptional cricketing skills. Get ready for a gripping battle as India and New Zealand vie for the ultimate match.
Article Summary: The india vs new zealand icc champions trophy 2025 promises thrilling cricket action. Cricket enthusiasts await the unfolding of this high-voltage match with bated breath. India, seeking their third title, will take on new zealand, the 2000 champions trophy champions, in a much-awaited contest.

Article Title: ICC Champions Trophy 2025 final match: India vs South Africa/New Zealand
Article Text:
ICC Champions Trophy 2025 final match: Date, venue, match time, and other details

ICC Champions Trophy final match: India vs South Africa/New Zealand

ICC Champions Trophy final match: Where to watch live telecast and streaming details

Live telecast

The ICC Champions Trophy 2025 final will be telecast live on the Star Sports Network in India.

The final will also be broadcast globally by official ICC broadcasting partners.

Live streaming

Cricket fans can watch the live streaming of the final on the JioCinema app and Hotstar website in India.

Other regions will have their respective streaming platforms, such as Sky Sports (UK) and Willow TV (USA).

India’s Champions Trophy final history

The ICC Champions Trophy 2025 has reached its climax, with cricket fans worldwide eagerly anticipating the final showdown. This edition of the tournament has been one of the most thrilling, featuring intense battles between top cricketing nations. India, having secured a commanding four-wicket victory over Australia in the first semifinal, has confirmed its place in the grand finale. The Men in Blue successfully chased down a target of 265, thanks to a composed 84-run knock by Virat Kohli. With this win, the highly anticipated final will now take place at the Dubai International Stadium instead of Lahore due to India's security concerns over traveling to Pakistan. India will face the winner of the second semifinal between South Africa and New Zealand in the final scheduled for March 9.In the first semifinal held at the Dubai International Stadium, Australia posted a competitive total of 264 runs, led by crucial contributions from Steve Smith (73) and Alex Carey (61). However, India displayed their composure in the chase, with Player of the Match Virat Kohli anchoring the innings with a well-crafted 84 off 98 balls. The Indian side successfully reached the target in 48.1 overs, ensuring their fifth appearance in a Champions Trophy final.The grand finale of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 is set to be a spectacle, with India taking on either South Africa or New Zealand, who will compete in the second semifinal. Both teams have shown exceptional form throughout the tournament, making the final a highly anticipated clash among cricket enthusiasts worldwide.India has a rich history in the Champions Trophy, having won the title twice before. Their first triumph came in 2002 when they shared the trophy with Sri Lanka due to rain-affected matches. In 2013, under the captaincy of MS Dhoni, India clinched the title with a memorable victory against England. The Men in Blue will now aim for their third ICC Champions Trophy title in the 2025 edition.
Article Summary: The icc champions trophy 2025 has reached its climax, with cricket fans worldwide eagerly anticipating the final showdown. This edition of the tournament has been one of the most thrilling, featuring intense battles between top cricketing nations.

Article Title: Oscars 2025: When and where to watch Oscars broadcast live in India, check Oscars 2025 nominations list of best movies, actor, and more
Article Text:
Oscars 2025 broadcast live in India: Check time and streaming details

Conan O'Brien to host Oscars 2025

Oscars 2025: Star-studded presenters, historic performances, and a special tribute

Oscars 2025 nominations list

Oscars 2025 Best Picture nominees

"Anora"

"The Brutalist"

"A Complete Unknown"

"Conclave"

"Dune: Part Two"

"Emilia Pérez"

"I'm Still Here"

"Nickel Boys"

"The Substance"

"Wicked"

Oscars 2025 acting categories

Oscars 2025: Other notable categories

The 97th Academy Awards are set to take place on Sunday, March 2, 2025, at the iconic Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles, California. This annual event celebrates outstanding achievements in the film industry, honoring the year's most exceptional movies, performances, and technical contributions. Film enthusiasts worldwide eagerly await this prestigious ceremony, which not only showcases cinematic excellence but also reflects the evolving landscape of storytelling and filmmaking. With a diverse array of nominees and anticipated performances, the 2025 Oscars promise to be a memorable occasion, highlighting the creativity and dedication of filmmakers and artists across the globe.For viewers in India, the Oscars will be broadcast live on Star Movies and streamed on JioHotstar starting at 5:30 AM IST on March 3. According to an official press release, JioHotstar will also offer the ceremony on-demand after the live telecast. In the United States, the event will air on ABC at 7 p.m. Eastern/4 p.m. Pacific, with streaming available on platforms such as Hulu, Hulu Live TV, YouTubeTV, AT&T TV, and FuboTV. These broadcasting arrangements ensure that audiences worldwide can participate in celebrating cinematic achievements.Emmy Award-winning television host, writer, and comedian Conan O'Brien will host the Oscars for the first time, succeeding Jimmy Kimmel. Known for his sharp wit and humor, O'Brien is expected to bring an entertaining touch to the ceremony. Addressing his approach, he stated, "I think as host I cannot ignore the moment we're in right now, but also it's threading a needle. I want to do it with humor and also make sure the night doesn't drift into only that." His unique comedic style is anticipated to add a fresh dynamic to the event.The 97th Academy Awards will feature an impressive list of presenters, including Selena Gomez, Joe Alwyn, Lily-Rose Depp, Goldie Hawn, Connie Nielsen, Sterling K. Brown, Ana de Armas, Ben Stiller, Willem Dafoe, Oprah Winfrey, Halle Berry, Penélope Cruz, Elle Fanning, Whoopi Goldberg, Scarlett Johansson, John Lithgow, Amy Poehler, June Squibb, and Bowen Yang.Additionally, last year’s Oscar winners Cillian Murphy, Emma Stone, Robert Downey Jr., and Da’Vine Joy Randolph will return to present major acting awards. Music lovers can look forward to electrifying performances at the ceremony. BLACKPINK’s Lisa, making history as the first K-pop artist to perform at the Academy Awards, will take the stage alongside Doja Cat and Raye. Lisa is expected to perform her newly released song "Born Again."The ceremony will also feature a special "Wicked" medley by Ariana Grande and Cynthia Erivo, as well as an appearance by the Los Angeles Master Chorale. A highlight of the evening will be a tribute to music legend Quincy Jones by rapper and singer Queen Latifah. Executive producer Raj Kapoor shared, "One of the most exciting things that we've worked on this year is a musical performance that will tribute Quincy Jones. Queen Latifah will be a part of the performance."The nominations for this year’s Oscars were announced in January, with "Emilia Pérez" leading with 13 nominations. This French-Mexican musical, directed by Jacques Audiard, tells the story of a drug-running mobster who undergoes a gender transition. Other strong contenders include "The Brutalist" and "Wicked," each receiving 10 nominations, while "Conclave" and "A Complete Unknown" garnered eight nods each.The ‘Best Picture’ category features a diverse lineup of films:These films represent a wide range of genres and storytelling techniques, reflecting the industry's creative diversity.In the Best Actor category, Timothée Chalamet has been nominated for his portrayal of Bob Dylan in "A Complete Unknown." He competes against Adrien Brody ("The Brutalist"), Colman Domingo ("Sing Sing"), Ralph Fiennes ("Conclave"), and Sebastian Stan ("The Apprentice"). Notably, Brody remains the youngest winner in Oscar history in this category, having won at age 29 for "The Pianist" in 2003.The Best Actress nominees include Demi Moore for her role in the horror film "The Substance," Cynthia Erivo ("Wicked"), Mikey Madison ("Anora"), Fernanda Torres ("I'm Still Here"), and Karla Sofía Gascón ("Emilia Pérez"). Gascón's nomination is particularly significant as she becomes the first openly transgender actress to receive this recognition.The Best Director category features Jacques Audiard ("Emilia Pérez"), Coralie Fargeat ("The Substance"), James Mangold ("A Complete Unknown"), Sean Baker ("Anora"), and Brady Corbet ("The Brutalist"). In the Best Supporting Actor category, "Succession" stars Kieran Culkin ("A Real Pain") and Jeremy Strong ("The Apprentice") have received their first.
Article Summary: The 97th academy awards are set to take place on sunday, march 2, 2025, at the iconic dolby theatre in los angeles, california. The ceremony will feature an impressive list of presenters, including selena gomez, joe alwyn, lily-rose depp, goldie hawn, sterling k. brown, ben stiller, willem dafoe, oprah winfrey, halle berry, penélope cruz, elle fanning, scarlett johansson, john lithgow, amy poehler, june squibb, and bowen yang.

Article Title: Fortnite OG Pass Season 3 brings new skins, cosmetics and more
Article Text:
Image via Epic Gmes

Fortnite OG Pass Season 3: New skins and cosmetics

Power Punk

Mecha R3X

Sir Raven

Fortnite OG Pass Season 3: Unlocking rewards

Fortnite has launched its OG Pass Season 3, offering players a mix of nostalgic and revamped rewards inspired by Chapter 1, Season 3. This latest update combines classic elements with new content, making it a treat for both veteran players and newcomers.The OG Pass Season 3 introduces three standout skins:, a customizable female character with pink hair and a removable helmet;, a hybrid of man, dinosaur, and robot; and, a dark and regal knight with glowing purple eyes. Each skin comes with matching accessories, including back blings, gliders, pickaxes, and emotes. Players can unlock alternative styles for these skins as they progress through the pass.The pass features 45 tiers of rewards, including sprays, banners, loading screens, and weapon wraps. Players can earn XP across all game modes to unlock these items. The OG Pass is available for 1,000 V-Bucks, and Fortnite Crew subscribers automatically gain access to both free and premium reward tracks.In addition to the cosmetics, the update brings back fan-favorite elements like the Lucky Landing point of interest and classic weapons such as the Guided Missile and Pump Shotgun. The return of the 50v50 Limited Time Mode adds to the excitement, offering chaotic team battles reminiscent of Fortnite's early days.The OG Pass Season 3 is available until June 8, 2025, giving players ample time to relive the nostalgia and enjoy the new offerings.
Article Summary: Fortnite has launched its og pass season 3, offering players a mix of nostalgic and revamped rewards inspired by chapter 1, season 3. The latest update combines classic elements with new content, making it a treat for both veteran players and newcomers. The pass features 45 tiers of rewards, including sprays, banners, loading screens, and weapon wraps.

Article Title: Instagram introduces 3 new features for Cricket fans this IPL season
Article Text: Instagram has launched new features to enhance cricket fans' engagement during the Indian Premier League (IPL). Users can now create 3-minute Reels, showcase content in a new 3:4 vertical profile grid, and enjoy upgraded messaging features, including multilingual translations and group chat QR codes. These updates aim to boost content sharing and fan interactions.
Article Summary: Instagram has launched new features to enhance cricket fans' engagement during the indian premier league. Users can now create 3-minute reels, showcase content in a new 3:4 vertical profile grid, and enjoy upgraded messaging features. These updates aim to boost content sharing and fan interactions.
